GAME_ZIP64:
Kitronik :GAME ZIP64 MakeCode Package

This is the :GAME ZIP64 Package
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.clear:
Turn off all LEDs on the ZIP64 display.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.rotate:
Rotate LEDs forward.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.rotate|param|off: number of ZIP LEDs to rotate forward, eg: 1
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.setBrightness: Set the brightness of the ZIP64 display. This flag only applies to future operation.
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.setBrightness|pa: a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 255
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.setMatrixColor:
Set LED to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b) in the 8 x 8 matrix 
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.setPin: Set the pin where the ZIP LED is connected, defaults to P0.
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.setPixelColorAt:
Set LED to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b) in the 64 Pixel string 
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.show: Send all the changes to the ZIP64 display.
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.showColor: Shows whole ZIP64 display as a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.showRainbow: Shows a rainbow pattern on all LEDs.
GAME_ZIP64.ZIP64Display.showRainbow|para: the end hue value for the rainbow, eg: 360
the start hue value for the rainbow, eg: 1
GAME_ZIP64.buttonIsPressed: Determines if a :GAME ZIP64 button is pressed
GAME_ZIP64.colors: Gets the RGB value of a known color
GAME_ZIP64.createZIP64Display: Create a new ZIP LED driver for :GAME ZIP64 Display.
GAME_ZIP64.onButtonPress: Do something when one of the :GAME ZIP64 Buttons is pressed
GAME_ZIP64.onButtonPress|param|event: happening on the button, eg: click
GAME_ZIP64.rgb: Converts red, green, blue channels into a RGB color
GAME_ZIP64.rgb|param|blue: value of the blue channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
GAME_ZIP64.rgb|param|green: value of the green channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
GAME_ZIP64.rgb|param|red: value of the red channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
GAME_ZIP64.runMotor: Run vibration motor for a particular length of time
GAME_ZIP64.runMotor|param|run_time: is the length of time the motor will run in ms, eg: 100
GAME_ZIP64.setBuzzerPin: Setup micro:bit to play music through :GAME ZIP64 buzzer
ZipLedColors: Well known colors for ZIP LEDs
